content:
So I added a minor improvement to Webform Validation and patched it back to the Drupal 7 version. I used the little "Attribute this contribution" checkbox to select Backdrop as the organization after my name, out of curiousity. It got merged recently and that makes it show up on the Backdrop landing page on Drupal dot org. FYI. Seems it could be helpful in generating goodwill towards Backdrop if people remember to do that when they submit a patch back to the Drupal 7 version of modules.
Screen-Shot-2020-01-06-at-1.40.24-PM.jpg
